page.title: 04SECONDARY EDUCATION
page.content: {Lasswade High School Centre}caters for all pupils between the ages of 12-18 up to 6th year. There is a very wide{curriculum}offered- English, Mathematics, Sciences, Foreign Languages, Social Studies, Homecraft, Technical and Aesthetic Subjects. The roll at the school is 1532 with 110 teaching staff. People who wish to go on to further education must travel as there are no universities or colleges in the immediate area. Fortunately there are many colleges and 2 universities in nearby Edinburgh.
